name: Video Game Sales
data_intro: This dataset contains a list of video games with sales greater than 100,000 copies.  It was generated by a scrape of [vgchartz.com][1].

cat_feature_intro.Name: * Name - The games name
cat_feature_intro.Platform: * Platform - Platform of the games release (i.e. PC,PS4, etc.)

num_feature_intro.Year: * Year - Year of the game's release
num_feature_intro.NA_Sales: * NA_Sales - Sales in North America (in millions)
num_feature_intro.Other_Sales: * Other_Sales - Sales in the rest of the world (in millions)
